definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The catcher spat onto Robinson 's shoes, and the pitcher eyed him hatefully.
sentences.chinese: 捕手朝他的球鞋吐痰，投手則用憎惡的眼光瞪着他。

sentences.english: Shortly afterwards, a bird-catcher came and stood under the tree.
sentences.chinese: 不久，鳥捕手來，站在樹下。

sentences.english: In pain, the bird-catcher threw down his trap, and the noise made the Dove take wing.
sentences.chinese: 在痛苦，鳥類捕手扔了他的圈套，和噪聲採取了鴿翼。

sentences.english: Screenshot Captor is a program for taking screenshots on your computer.
sentences.chinese: 截圖捕手是一個以計算機上的屏幕截圖程序。

sentences.english: They dream of blanketing California and beyond.
sentences.chinese: 他們夢想地震捕手能夠覆蓋整個加州以及更遠的地方。

sentences.english: The bird-catcher was forced to go home empty-handed and without his revenge.
sentences.chinese: 鳥類捕手被迫回家兩手空空，沒有他的報復。

sentences.english: John didn't measure up to the best catchers, but he was a good one.
sentences.chinese: 約翰算不上是最好的捕手，但也算得上是優秀的。
第三容器也因此被稱爲“內核捕手”。

sentences.english: The one used depended on where the search parties and slave catchers were stationed.
sentences.chinese: 取決於使用的搜索隊和奴隸捕手駐紮的地方。

sentences.english: The catcher isn't too concerned about an inflamed right elbow.
sentences.chinese: 這名捕手不會很擔心他發炎紅腫的右手肘。

sentences.english: Resurrected and revitalized, the new Cooper is a real eye-catcher.
sentences.chinese: 恢復和振興，新的庫珀是一個真正的眼睛捕手。

sentences.english: Call a "Quality Start" as a catcher in any RTTS game.
sentences.chinese: 在RTTS模式中，作爲捕手叫出一場“優質先發”。

sentences.english: The bird-catcher helplessly watched the Dove fly away, then turned to kill the Ant.
sentences.chinese: 鳥類捕手無奈看着鴿子飛走，接着殺死螞蟻。

sentences.english: The Quake Catcher Network is far less sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 地震捕手網絡遠沒有這麼敏感。

sentences.english: The Ant, perceiving the bird-catcher's design, stung him on the foot.
sentences.chinese: 螞蟻，感知鳥捕手的設計，刺痛了他的腳。
